meanings.definition: To gain victory in a competition or conflict.
meanings.sent1: She wons the race with a big smile on her face.
meanings.sent2: He wons the chess match after a long strategic game.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel wons the nut-gathering contest in the park.
meanings.sent4: The sun wons the battle against the clouds, shining brightly.
meanings.sent5: The superhero wons the fight against the villain, saving the city.

meanings.definition: A unit of currency in South Korea.
meanings.sent1: He exchanged his dollars for South Korean wons.
meanings.sent2: The shopkeeper only accepted wons as payment.
meanings.sent3: She found a lucky penny that was worth a thousand wons.
meanings.sent4: The vending machine only accepted wons for snacks.
meanings.sent5: His piggy bank was full of shiny wons from his trip to Korea.

meanings.definition: To be victorious in a game or contest.
meanings.sent1: The team wons the basketball game in the final seconds.
meanings.sent2: She wons the spelling bee with her excellent language skills.
meanings.sent3: The cat wons the staring contest with a mischievous wink.
meanings.sent4: The flowers wons the beauty pageant with their vibrant colors.
meanings.sent5: The student wons the math competition by solving the most problems correctly.
